alert.note: Alert for Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Marshall; Northern La Porte; Pulaski; Southern La Porte; Starke; Western St. Joseph (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:29AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN ELKHART...ST. JOSEPH...NORTHWESTERN PULASKI...STARKE...NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL AND LA PORTE COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM EDT/630 AM CDT/... At 629 AM EDT/529 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Carlisle to near Hebron. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 43 and 45, between mile markers 51 and 56, and between mile markers 59 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern St. Joseph; Elkhart; Marshall; Northern La Porte; Pulaski; Southern La Porte; Starke; Western St. Joseph
